img_summary: The image depicts the "Tablet of the Three Supreme," a rare item from the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. This artifact considerably increases the player's critical hit chance when their health is low. It can be found in the Temple of Yellow Flowers, located in the Forest of Ferocity within The Webbed Hollow, by following the path ahead from the Shrine after defeating Commander Beatle. The tablet's intricate design and inscriptions reflect its significance as a powerful and rare in-game item.
